label: 奉幣
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ほうべい, ほうへい
説明文: Hōbei (J.) 奉幣, sometimes pronounced hōhei. Offerings of cloth (silk etc.) and/or paper made to one or more shrines (jinja) or ancestral mausolea, usually by the government or wealthy aristocrats.
